p: The ethanolic extract of E. myriochaetum was separated by column chromatography into 16 fractions, which were evaluated for their antioxidant capacity ( Table 2). Fraction 14 presented the highest value equivalent to Trolox (423.16 mM TE/g). For this reason, we chose to analyze its chemical composition by Ultra-Performance Liquid Chromatography (UPLC).
